Articles.Content: Or do anything, for that matter. All flight related controls (W,A,S,D, Space etc) Are not functional when I have mechjeb. However, whenever I remove Mechjeb, I regain my controls! What do?

One thing that I've noticed, and your issue might be this simple, is when I have the ascent computer up, it grabs "focus" of the mouse when you enter values etc. You have to click back on the game screen for your keystrokes to be registered by the game again. If that doesn't do the trick, report back here.
